name: Pixel Pong (Red Havoc)
description:
I hope that no one will laugh at this glorious GameMaker project that has helped me to get accepted to my high school or how you americans call it nowadays. It's a basic game a it is also a bit broken, not gonna lie. I made it back in 2017, when I didn't have a clue 'bout what the hell I was doing. So I though I should archive it online together with the source code for the future generations of the world.

It works with GameMaker, I do not mean the second edition that is out now, I mean the classic og one.
